name: OffDeal
headline: AI-native investment bank for small businesses
description: OffDeal is an AI-native investment bank, offering small business owners a faster, cheaper way to sell their companies at premium prices. Our AI technology automates most of the grunt work typically done by analysts at larger Wall Street banks, enabling our in-house M&A advisors to focus more on strategic client interactions, leading to better outcomes for both sellers and buyers.

founders.name: Ori Eldarov, Founder
founders.description:
Founder / CEO @ OffDeal 

building an AI-native investment bank for buying and selling small businesses. 
prev. mba @ harvard + couple of startup stints. 
lover of carbs and espresso martinis. avid runner and cyclist.

founders.name: Alston Lin, Founder
founders.description:
Founder / CTO @ OffDeal.

Previously, 
Founder / CTO @ Bizwise, 
SWE / SWE Intern @ Meta, Google, Yelp, PagerDuty, IBM, and Encircle. 
Software Engineering @ University of Waterloo.

markdown:
raw_markdown="[![logo](https://assets.offdeal.io/logo.svg)](https://offdeal.io/</>)
[Sellers](https://offdeal.io/</>)[Buyers](https://offdeal.io/</buyers>)[Advisors](https://offdeal.io/</advisors>)[Resources](https://offdeal.io/</blog>)
Get Started
# Get Multiple Offers for Your Business
We will find every strategic buyer for your business to maximize your sale price
Find Buyers
As featured in
[![forbes](https://assets.offdeal.io/forbes.png)](https://offdeal.io/<https:/www.forbes.com/councils/forbestechcouncil/2025/01/06/how-ai-can-transform-small-business-ma/>)[![yahoo](https://assets.offdeal.io/yahoo.png)](https://offdeal.io/<https:/finance.yahoo.com/news/offdeal-wants-help-small-businesses-173227983.html>)[![techcrunch](https://assets.offdeal.io/techcrunch.png)](https://offdeal.io/<https:/techcrunch.com/2024/09/12/offdeal-wants-to-help-small-businesses-find-big-exits-with-ai-agents/>)[![ycombinator](https://assets.offdeal.io/ycombinator.svg)](https://offdeal.io/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/offdeal>)
![landing_seller_hero](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_hero.png)
![bg_wrapper](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_bg_pattern.svg)
## Discover ideal buyers for your business in seconds
Using our custom AI algorithm, we analyze your business against 25K+ past M&A deals to identify ideal buyers, resulting in:
  * Higher offers from strategic buyers
  * Faster deal closure with vetted prospects
  * Reduced risk of deal failure

[Discover buyers with AI](https://offdeal.io/</match>)
## Why Choose OffDeal?
![landing_seller_difference_icon1](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_difference_icon1.svg)
**Higher Sales Price**
Our Al identifies strategic buyers who truly understand your business value.
  * More informed buyers lead to more competitive offers and higher sale prices.


![landing_seller_difference_icon2](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_difference_icon2.svg)
**Sell in <180 Days**
Streamlined onboarding, buyer discovery and diligence results in faster sales.
  * We close deals within 6 months, with first LOI received under 60 days.


![landing_seller_difference_icon3](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_difference_icon3.svg)
**Enhanced Confidentiality**
Our advisors reach out only to vetted, curated buyers, protecting your privacy.
  * AI-assisted buyer targeting ensures a discreet, focused process.


## Expert Guidance, Enhanced with AI
We recognize the significance of passing on your life's work. While AI plays a crucial role, our top industry M&A experts ensure personalized, unparalleled results and customer service at every step.
01
#### Success-Based Fees
  * No retainers or hidden costs - you don't pay until your business is sold.
  * Our M&A advisors are fully invested in maximizing your exit value.


02
#### Enhanced Advisor Support
  * Our AI handles the time-consuming tasks, freeing up our advisors to focus on you.
  * Enjoy personalized guidance and strategic support throughout your journey. Our advisors do all the heavy lifting so you can focus on running your business.


03
#### Data-Driven Decisions
  * Get tailored advice combining human expertise with AI-powered insights.
  * Make confident decisions backed by real-time data and years of industry experience.


![landing_seller_why1](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_why1.png)![landing_seller_why2](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_why2.png)![landing_seller_why3](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_why3.png)
## Your Path to a Premium Exit
Our streamlined process ensures you receive expert guidance every step of the way.
Book free consultation
![landing_seller_steps_icon1](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_steps_icon1.svg)
Step 1
### Free Discovery & AI Match
  * Time: < 1 day
  * Discuss your goals and receive an initial AI-curated list of vetted potential buyers


![landing_seller_steps_icon2](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_steps_icon2.svg)
Step 2
### Comprehensive Evaluation
  * Time: < 1 day
  * Receive a data-driven valuation and sale readiness evaluation


![landing_seller_steps_icon3](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_steps_icon3.svg)
Step 3
### Targeted Buyer Outreach
  * Time: 2-4 weeks
  * We discreetly engage with a tailored list of potential buyers


![landing_seller_steps_icon4](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_steps_icon4.svg)
Step 4
### Expert Guided Process
  * Time: 4-8 weeks
  * Navigate the sale process with ease, guided by our M&A experts.


![landing_seller_steps_icon5](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_seller_steps_icon5.svg)
Step 5
### Efficient Negotiations & Closing
  * Time: 4-8 weeks
  * Streamlined process to finalize the deal on your terms


## Frequently Asked Questions
What size businesses does OffDeal typically work with?
OffDeal typically specializes in businesses with annual revenues between $5 million and $100 million.
How does OffDeal's AI technology find potential buyers?
Our custom AI algorithm analyzes your publicly available business details (e.g. key products and services offered, end markets served, business model, etc.) and matches it against our extensive database of M&A transactions and potential buyers, identifying those most likely to be interested and offer competitive prices.
Is my business information kept confidential during the selling process?
Absolutely. We use targeted outreach to a curated list of vetted buyers, maintaining strict confidentiality throughout the process. Additionally, your data is stored securely with OffDeal and is not used to train any third-party models.
How long does it typically take to sell a business through OffDeal?
While every sale is unique, our AI-enhanced process often results in faster closings than traditional methods, usually under 6 months.
What makes OffDeal different from traditional M&A advisors?
OffDeal combines expert human guidance with AI-powered M&A matching and cutting-edge automation tools, offering a more efficient, data-driven approach to selling your business.
How does OffDeal's fee structure work?
We operate on a success-based fee model. You only pay when your business sells, aligning our interests with yours for the best possible outcome.
Can OffDeal help prepare my business for sale?
Yes, we provide a comprehensive evaluation of your business and offer specific recommendations to maximize its value before and during the sale process.
What industries does OffDeal specialize in?
Our AI-driven approach allows us to effectively serve a wide range of industries. We've successfully handled sales across various sectors.
How involved will I need to be in the selling process?
While your input is crucial, our aim is to handle the complex details, allowing you to focus on running your business. We keep you informed and involved in key decisions throughout the process. We aim to minimize disruption to your daily operations.
What if the AI doesn't find a suitable buyer for my business?
Our process combines AI matching with human expertise. If AI doesn't immediately identify ideal matches, our experienced M&A advisors will leverage their networks and industry knowledge to find suitable buyers.
![landing_cta](https://assets.offdeal.io/landing_cta_desktop.svg)
## Ready to Maximize Your Business Value?
Get in touch with our M&A experts to start your journey to a faster, more valuable exit.
Schedule Call
![logo](https://assets.offdeal.io/logo_white.svg)

generated_description:
**OffDeal: Revolutionizing Small Business Sales with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in New York, OffDeal is an innovative player in the financial tech landscape, operating as an AI-native investment bank specifically tailored for small businesses. As part of the Y Combinator Batch W24, OffDeal aims to provide small business owners with a streamlined, efficient, and cost-effective way to sell their companies, maximizing sale prices while minimizing traditional headaches.

### Mission

OffDeal’s mission is straightforward: to empower small business owners with the tools to sell their companies quickly and at premium prices. By leveraging advanced AI technology, OffDeal automates the grunt work typically associated with larger Wall Street banks, freeing their M&A advisors to engage more meaningfully with clients. This not only enhances the selling experience but also improves outcomes for both sellers and buyers.

### The Approach

OffDeal utilizes a custom AI algorithm that analyzes over 25,000 past mergers and acquisitions (M&A) transactions to identify the best potential buyers for your business. This results in several key advantages:

- **Higher Sales Prices**: Their AI identifies strategic buyers who appreciate the true value of your business.
- **Faster Transaction Times**: OffDeal aims to close deals within six months, often securing Letters of Intent (LOIs) in under 60 days.
- **Increased Confidentiality**: They focus outreach only on vetted, curated buyers, ensuring your privacy is maintained throughout the process.

### The Team and Leadership

With a lean team of just two members, OffDeal is guided by industry expertise and the leadership of Nicolas Dessaigne as their Group Partner. This compact but skilled team ensures that clients receive personalized attention and strategic guidance.

### Fee Structure and Services

OffDeal operates on a success-based fee model, meaning clients pay only when their business is sold. This aligns the interests of the advisory team with those of the sellers, motivating them to secure the best possible exit value. Their services include:

- **Free Discovery & AI Matching**: Initial evaluations and buyer lists are provided quickly.
- **Comprehensive Evaluations**: Data-driven insights help prepare businesses for sale.
- **Expert Guidance**: Ongoing support ensures a smooth transition throughout the selling process.

### Target Market

OffDeal specializes in businesses with annual revenues ranging from $5 million to $100 million and serves various industries through its AI-driven approach. Their focus on small to mid-sized businesses (SMBs) sets them apart from traditional M&A advisors who often cater to larger corporations.

### Conclusion

In today’s dynamic market, OffDeal offers a fresh approach to business sales, integrating technology with expert human insight. Their commitment to higher offers, quicker sales, and enhanced confidentiality positions them as a reliable partner for small business owners looking to maximize their exit value.

For more information or to start your journey towards a seamless business sale, check them out at [OffDeal.io](https://offdeal.io).
